hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I have my own business online pharmacy in england The worst development in the area of hyper-democracy is the recall. Recall elections have a place in extreme circumstances. They allow voters to fire an elected official who is breaking the law or otherwise committing acts so egregious he or she should not be allowed to stay on until the next election. But as has happened with the Senate filibuster, recall elections have been terribly abused.
